entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Coronach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
